hero.title: Dr. Sorany Díaz P.
hero.subtitle: Specialist in Aesthetic Dentistry and Oral Rehabilitation
hero.description: Transforming smiles with advanced techniques and personalized care. Over 15 years of experience providing world-class dental services.

about.title: About the Doctor
about.subtitle: Experience and Excellence in Dentistry
about.description: Dr. Sorany Díaz P. is a renowned specialist in aesthetic dentistry with over 15 years of experience. Graduated with honors from Universidad Nacional Pedro Henríquez Ureña, she has dedicated her career to perfecting advanced techniques in oral rehabilitation and dental aesthetics.

services.title: Specialized Services
services.subtitle: Cutting-Edge Treatments for Your Perfect Smile

aesthetic.title: Aesthetic Dentistry
aesthetic.description: Porcelain veneers, professional whitening, and personalized smile design.

rehabilitation.title: Oral Rehabilitation
rehabilitation.description: Complete restoration of dental function and aesthetics with advanced techniques.

implants.title: Dental Implants
implants.description: Permanent solutions with state-of-the-art titanium implants.

orthodontics.title: Invisible Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: Clear aligners to discreetly correct dental positioning.

testimonial1.text: Dr. Sorany completely transformed my smile. Her professionalism and attention to detail are exceptional. I recommend her services 100%.
testimonial1.author: María González

testimonial2.text: I came from Miami for oral rehabilitation treatment. The result exceeded all my expectations. Definitely worth the trip.
testimonial2.author: James Rodriguez

testimonial3.text: Excellent care and incredible results. The doctor is very professional and her team makes you feel at home.
testimonial3.author: Ana Martínez

footer.description: Specialist in aesthetic dentistry and oral rehabilitation. Transforming smiles with advanced techniques and personalized care.
